timeline.bodyText: Should this be constant, that could be a good place to include the unit in the name, because I hope that is milliseconds?

replies.bodyText:
Yes, that is milliseconds. This is the crux of the fix. Before I thought these were seconds (wanted 5 seconds).
Sure, a constant could be done added.
